mapper.select: select DISTINCT g.gname,g.g_m_id,pm.pm_g_gno,pm.pm_m_userid,g.actionstatus,f.f_name from goods g join pricemonitoring pm on g.gno = pm.pm_g_gno join goodsfile f on g.gno = f.f_g_gno where pm.pm_m_userid = #{pm_m_userid} and g.actionstatus != 2 order by pmno desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select a.ano, a.a_m_id, a.a_g_gno, a.a_g_actionstatus, a.a_g_enddate,f.f_name,g.gname,a.paystatus,a.deliverystatus from myaction a join goods g on a.a_g_gno = g.gno join goodsfile f on a.a_g_gno = f.f_g_gno where a.a_m_id = #{a_m_id} and a.a_g_actionstatus=2 limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
select DISTINCT g.gname,g.g_m_id,g.gno,pm.pm_m_userid,g.actionstatus from goods g join pricemonitoring pm on g.gno = pm.pm_g_gno where pm_m_userid = #{pm_m_userid}
